Html:
I had good luck setting up PHPExcel on a Windows server but not I'm trying to do it on my FreeBSD (Unix) server which is running Apache-1.3.42 with php 5.3.2. I'm getting this error message:
Class 'ZipArchive' not found in /usr/local/apache/htdocs/usff/Classes/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel2007.php on line 205
The zip as well as the rar ports are installed on this system.
